content.description:
Start straight through lower bolts with strategy Stay up and right, clipping through 4th bolt to a side pull traverse left under the next bolt. Continue up bolt line, trending left toward anchors.

the route follows the bolt line and the looser areas (left side of formation) can and should be avoided
content.location: Follow trail up to High Top Crags, following along the base of formations North along the bend West, following uphill walk to meadow-like opening at the base of The Umbrage. Route is located left-most, nearest the cave opening when looking at the face.

content.description: Bolted line on the short formation. Short but good.
Scramble to 1st bolt, climb up and slightly right on good holds that are occasionally smaller than you'd like. Crux at 3rd bolt.
content.location: Following area info, it's the route in the middle of 'Vacillation" and "Coruscation" with its anchors about mid way up formation.

content.description:
Sustained sequences to start up smaller block (see photo), traversing left to larger face, and continuing up face climbing on sloped crimps until some good holds, followed by easier terrain to meet another decent sequence on the face before the anchors.

Aim to finish at the jugs about 1 meter or so to the right of Coruscation anchors.
content.protection: Set TR anchor by leading Coruscation.
content.location:
Starts on the small wall arete/face and continues up on side pulls and possible knee jam to high steps and small holds. Once up smaller block, go left to larger face, stepping on and going up; staying about a 1-2 meters right of the Coruscation bolts.

Between Coruscation and Sovereignty.

content.description: Stands out on the main face. Start on good holds to clip then into sustained movement thatâ€™ll offer few good rests before a break between the fourth and fifth bolt. Some acrobatics move to finish.
